channel.title: Visigoths vs. Mall Goths: Where's Raven?
channel.description:
![mallgoths2|606x500](upload://7yQD2taExp53jFsNZVRGOUH08Ac.png)
richardruane (he/him) [6:21 PM] It’s another Saturday at the mall and Raven Goldberg is missing. The Mall Goths need to find Raven, the Visigoths are up to some crazy scheme their queen cooked up, and everyone is terrified they’ll discover that they’re way too pure on the new Goth Purity test.
***Each session is a 1-shot!***
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) will be in use.
[date=2019-06-02 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-06-02 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Sunday One-Shot, June 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lb_FRF1M7ArH2HfYl6t)
[date=2019-06-16 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-06-16 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Sunday One-Shot, June 16](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lb_FdCkA3Y8Z9mQsfkM)

mallgoths2746×615 800 KB

richardruane (he/him) [6:21 PM]
It’s another Saturday at the mall and Raven Goldberg is missing. The Mall Goths need to find Raven, the Visigoths are up to some crazy scheme their queen cooked up, and everyone is terrified they’ll discover that they’re way too pure on the new Goth Purity test.

Each session is a 1-shot!

The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy will be in play and the X-Card will be in use.
